title: Influence Network Discovery
scenario: Reveal coordinated influence activity by correlating narrative echoes, shared entities, and cross-platform references.
description: Exploratory recipe for influence network discovery with lab-safe fixtures.

pipelines.description: Cluster narratives by shared entities and messaging overlap.
pipelines.query: MATCH (n:Narrative)-[r:REFERS_TO]->(e:Entity) RETURN n, r, e LIMIT 40

pipelines.description: Score influence patterns based on cross-entity propagation signals.
pipelines.query: MATCH (a:Actor)-[r:AMPLIFIES]->(n:Narrative) RETURN a, r, n LIMIT 40

evaluationMetrics.description: Proxy precision based on high-confidence entity matches.
Median query latency per pipeline step.

successCriteria: Detect coordinated narrative clusters with repeatable entity overlap.
Keep median query latency within the defined latency budget.
